explains: adj. 和蔼可亲的；友善的

sentences.en: He was affable at one moment, choleric the next.
sentences.cn: 他时而友善和蔼，时而暴躁易怒。

sentences.en: Mr. Brooke is an extremely affable and approachable man.
sentences.cn: 布鲁克先生是一个极为和蔼可亲的人。

sentences.en: Forrest was normally mild-mannered, affable, and untalkative.
sentences.cn: 福里斯特通常态度温和，和蔼可亲，不善言辞。
